row.process:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CONNECTIVITY.PRV.INCLUDE.TRACEROUTE_LOGGING_PARAMS
: ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_CONNECTIVITY.PRV.STORE", "TRACERT_UNIX", T, N : SET &TASKDIR#=&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK# : SET &SHFILE#="pck_network_tracert.sh"
: SWITCH &UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS# : CASE "WinRM" : STOP MSG, 50, "WinRM is only supported by Windows Platforms." : CASE "SSH" ! Create 2 files for Unix and windows commands. then use based on os.. : SET &HOST_ADDR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_REMOTE_HOST_ADDR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &HOST_ADDR# : SET &ADV_OPTS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_ADVANCED_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &ADV_OPTS# : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = 'sed -i ''s/\r$//'' ./&$RUNID#/&SHFILE#;bash ./&$RUNID#/&SHFILE# "&HOST_ADDR#" &UC4RB_AIOPS_RESOLVE_ADDR# &UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_HOPS# &UC4RB_AIOPS_REPLY_TIMEOUT# &UC4RB_AIOPS_IP_VERSION# "&ADV_OPTS#"' : P "INFO: UNIX Script: &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#" : SET &TEMP_UNIX#="&TASKDIR#tracert_unix.txt" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &TEMP_UNIX# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CONNECTIVITY.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE
: SET &HOST_ADDR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_REMOTE_HOST_ADDR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &HOST_ADDR# : SET &ADV_OPTS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_ADVANCED_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &ADV_OPTS# : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_CONNECTIVITY.PRV.STORE", "TRACERT_WIN", T, N : SET &PSFILE#="pck_network_tracert.ps1" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = 'powershell .\&$RUNID#\&PSFILE# "\"&HOST_ADDR#\"" &UC4RB_AIOPS_RESOLVE_ADDR# &UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_HOPS# &UC4RB_AIOPS_REPLY_TIMEOUT# &UC4RB_AIOPS_IP_VERSION# "\"&ADV_OPTS#\""' : P "INFO: Windows Script: &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#" : SET &TEMP_WIN#="&TASKDIR#tracert_win.txt" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &TEMP_WIN# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CONNECTIVITY.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_SSH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_ARGS
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_DETECT_OSNAME if [ "$UC4RB_SSH_OSNAME" == "WINDOWS" ] ; then cmdFile='&TEMP_WIN#' java -jar "&UC4RB_SSH_JARPATH#" -action RunScriptAction &UC4RB_SSH_WIN_ARGS# -cmdfile $cmdFile -sourcepath " &TASKDIR# " else cmdFile='&TEMP_UNIX#' java -jar "&UC4RB_SSH_JARPATH#" -action RunScriptAction &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# -cmdfile $cmdFile -sourcepath " &TASKDIR# " fi : CASE "Agent" : SET &HOST_ADDR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_REMOTE_HOST_ADDR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &HOST_ADDR# : SET &ADV_OPTS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_ADVANCED_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &ADV_OPTS# "&TASKDIR#&SHFILE#" "&HOST_ADDR#" &UC4RB_AIOPS_RESOLVE_ADDR# &UC4RB_AIOPS_MAX_HOPS# &UC4RB_AIOPS_REPLY_TIMEOUT# &UC4RB_AIOPS_IP_VERSION# "&ADV_OPTS#" : ENDSWITCH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
